            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_27" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">MPF/ORSO complaints received from following channels are generally handled by HSBC Pensions’ dedicated complaint handling teams:</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>HSBC MPF Member Hotline</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><a href="tel:85231280128" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 3128 0128</a></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>HSBC MPF Employer Hotline</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><a href="tel:85225838033" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2583 8033</a></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>ORSO Services Hotline</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><a href="tel:85222886655" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2288 6655</a></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Fax</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><a href="tel:85222693085" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2269 3085</a></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Email</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><a href="mailto:customer.care.mpf@hsbc.com.hk">customer.care.mpf@hsbc.com.hk</a><br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Send a letter</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>MPF:</strong><br> The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation Limited<br> PO Box 73770 Kowloon Central Post Office</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>ORSO:</strong><br> The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation Limited<br> PO Box 74203 Kowloon Central Post Office</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Getting back to you</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We will acknowledge receipt of your concerns by the next working day and aim to resolve most issues within 5 working days. Occasionally, we may need more time but we will keep you informed.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Handling your complaint</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Your complaint will be handled with complete confidentiality by our complaint handling teams with the appropriate experience and authority, and who have not been directly involved in the subject matter.<br> If a complaint is raised by a third party, we will get back to you to protect your privacy.<br> We will offer appropriate redress if your complaint is upheld, but this will not necessarily involve financial compensation.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>If you’re not satisfied …</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can ask for your case to be reviewed by management at a higher level, if you are dissatisfied with our decision.<br> For monetary disputes, you may also refer your case to the Financial Dispute Resolution Center (FDRC), Room 408-409, 4/F, West Wing, Justice Place, 11 Ice House Street, Central, Hong Kong.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><a href="#ways-to-contact-us">Back to selection menu</a></p>
</div></div>
